# ApiClient.Wait method

Client side Wait or Pause.

```csharp
public void Wait(int milliSeconds)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| milliSeconds | The number of milliseconds to wait. |

## Examples

```csharp
api.Wait(3000); //Waits 3 seconds before continuing
```
